name: purescript-concur-starter
description: A Starter kit for Purescript-Concur. Uses Parcel.

scripts.dev: rimraf temp && bower install && pulp build && parcel build index.html
scripts.prod: rimraf temp && bower install && mkdir temp && pulp build --to temp/index.prod.js && java -jar closure-compiler/closure-compiler-v20190301.jar --js temp/index.prod.js --js_output_file temp/index.prod.minified.js && cp index.prod.html temp && parcel build temp/index.prod.html && rimraf temp

author: Anupam Jain <ajnsit@gmail.com> (https://github.com/ajnsit)
